law.catch_line: Voter, when exempt from arrest on civil process -- Effect of violation.
law.text: No sheriff shall execute any civil process of arrest upon any voter attending an election at which he has the right to vote, or in going to or returning from such an election. Execution by a sheriff of any such process contrary to this section is void.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4568.
